name: MusicCatalogSearchRequest
desc: A request that your app uses to fetch items from the Apple Music catalog using a search term.

items.name: init(term: String, types: [MusicCatalogSearchable.Type])
items.desc: Creates a catalog search request for a specified search term and list of catalog searchable types.

items.name: var limit: Int?
items.desc: A limit for the number of items to return in the catalog search response.

items.name: let term: String
items.desc: The search term for the request.

items.name: var types: [MusicCatalogSearchable.Type]
items.desc: The list of requested catalog searchable types.

items.name: func response() async throws -> MusicCatalogSearchResponse
items.desc: Fetches items of the requested catalog searchable types that match the search term of the request.
